Posts.Content: I was wondering why my boobs always itch. I mean there are times I can just itch for ever.It's not exactly in the nipple area just below that area. I am constantly scratching and it gets embarrasing...Can someone answer this question? This isn't a sign of breast cancer is it? I am concerned because my mom had breast cancer and died at 48 and now I am 45....SCARY
Posts.Title: Itchy breasts all the time????

Posts.Content: (hollygirl05) Please let me know what the doctor say's about your itchy breasts.I am just curious thats all,thanks Cathy
